1205.name: CONFLICT_IP_ADDRESS
1205.message:
Unable to connect to the network
because the Wii U console and another
device are using the same IP address.

Select Connect to the Internet under the
Internet option in System Settings, and
then select Connections and choose
the appropriate network. Next, select
Change Settings. Select IP Address,
and confirm that Auto-obtain has been
selected.

If the network requires a manual IP
address, select IP Address then select
Don't Auto-obtain. You will be prompted
to enter an IP address manually.
1205.short_description: The Wii U console and another device on the network are using the same IP address.
1205.long_description: (CONNECTION SLOT 5) The Wii U console and another device on the network are using the same IP address.
1205.short_solution: Change the IP address or set the IP address to auto-obtain.
1205.long_solution: Change the IP address or set the IP address to auto-obtain. Alternatively, change the IP address being used by the conflicting device.
